column1: The Great Lake lay in the center of Middle-earth when all the lands and seas were symmetrical. In the middle of the lake was the Isle of Almaren
column2: the first dwelling of the Valar in Arda.

column1: After the expulsion of Morgoth from Arda in the Valian Years 1
column3: the Valar brought order to the seas and lands and it may have been at this time that the Great Lake was formed.

column2: 450 Melkor came forth in war and cast down the Two Lamps. Their destruction broke the lands and roiled the seas. The dwelling of the Valar upon Almaren was utterly destroyed and the island and the Great Lake disappeared in the tumult.
